articles.content: Junior Dos Santos flattened heavyweights left and right between 2008 and 2012 in the UFC, scoring seven knockouts in nine octagon appearances from his debut win over Fabricio Werdum and his title def… [+3931 chars]

articles.title: Rangers have no answers after Hurricanes turn up heat in third - New York Post
articles.description: Hurricanes coach Rod Brind’Amour credited his team’s mentality shift for what became a push the Rangers couldn’t overcome.
articles.content:
Ian Cole says its a strength of the Hurricanes to be objective in their self-assessment. After two periods Wednesday night, the conclusion of that objective analysis was obvious: Not good enough.
